page.title: 11AMENITIES AT HARDWICK
page.content: Perhaps one of the most startling facts about this area is the almost total{lack of amenities.}Apart from a {church}at Ault Hucknall,{Country Park connected to Hardwick Hall, a{lighting firm at Hardstoft, the{Hardwick {Inn,}and a weekly{bread van}in some areas, there are no facilities. Such things as schools, medical and dental surgeries and shops are all outside the area. The lack of local public transport perhaps intesifies this although most residents have use of a car. However, this lack of facilities must be seen in the light of a very {small population.}Infact one square kilometre of this area contained no habitation whatsoever.
